name: Circular pong (itch) (Max Omerzu)
description:
Circular Pong is a fast-paced arcade-style game that combines the classic gameplay of Pong with a unique circular arena. In this single-player game, you control a paddle that moves around the edge of a circular playing field. Your objective is to keep the ball bouncing for as long as possible, using your paddle to deflect it back towards the center of the circle. As you progress, the ball will move faster and faster, requiring quick reflexes and precise timing to keep up.

Circular Pong features simple yet addictive gameplay, with intuitive controls and challenging mechanics that keep you coming back for more. The game's minimalist graphics and atmospheric soundtrack create a mesmerizing experience that draws you into the action. With a variety of difficulty levels and endless replayability, Circular Pong is the perfect game for casual players and hardcore gamers alike. So step up to the circular arena and see how long you can last!
